text: Zamain-o-aasamanon ki her her cheez Allah Taalaa hi ki milkiyat mein hai aur waqaee hum ney unn logon ko jo tum say pehlay kitab diye gaye thay aur tum ko bhi yehi hukum kiya hai kay Allah say dartay raho aur agar tum kufur kero to yaad rakho kay Allah kay liye hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur jo kuch zamin mein hai aur Allah boht bey niaz aur tareef kiya gaya hai
